Detailed Description

This class is used to represent an user data object type.

PyTypeObject *  pType

Parameters:

UserDataObjectTypes & UserDataObjectType::getTypes (  )  [static]

This static method is used to get the vector of user data object types.

bool UserDataObjectType::hasProperty ( const char *  attr  )  const

This method returns the DataDescription associated with the attribute with the input name.

If no such DataDescription exists, NULL is returned.

bool UserDataObjectType::init (  )  [static]

This method needs to be called in order to initialise the different user data object types.

Returns:
True on success, false otherwise.

bool UserDataObjectType::load ( UserDataObjectTypes &  types  )  [static]

This method loads all the user data type objects and puts them into types.

Returns:
True on success, false otherwise.

void UserDataObjectType::migrate ( UserDataObjectTypes &  types  )  [static]

This static method migrates the collection of user data objects to a reloaded version of their modules.

UserDataObject * UserDataObjectType::newUserDataObject ( const UniqueID &  guid  )  const

This method creates an user data object of this type.

Returns:
A new UserDataObject of this type that has not been initialised.
